name: Wasset
description:
We've developed and deployed our token on the celo mainnet (CA: 0x42C16109b85cf9552fA1A068EB46fF5117d964B4)
This token will allow the trading of recyclables and products on our marketplace.

We have also developed a lottery Dapo on the Celo Alfajores network. Working to launch it along with other utilities.
